title: How far can complementary and alternative medicine go? The c
author: Kelner; Merrijoy; Wellman; Beverly; Welsh; Sandy; Boon; Heather
description: This paper examines the efforts of two complementary and alternative occupations, chiropractors and homeopaths, to move from the margins to the mainstream in health care in the province of Ontario. We
cleaned_text: far can complementary and alternative medicine go?
